item.title: Possible Conflict w/2.0 Patch
item.author: invalid@example.com (Slaughter.SP)
item.dc:creator: Slaughter.SP
item.content:encoded:
FYI:

There is a possible conflict w/code changes in the next patch and current Galtanor's Invasion code. I am testing the patch and when I join my server with all the other mutators running I can play just fine, however the patched client crashes when I press Esc to bring up the menu to Exit Game. If I run Invasion all by itself (without any other mutators), the client crashes when trying to join the server. Both crashes have the same error message:

Code:
Critical: appError called:...
Possible Conflict w/2.0 Patch

item.title: Crashes
item.author: invalid@example.com (Slushie_Man)
item.dc:creator: Slushie_Man
item.content:encoded:
Whenever I try to load up the menu while playing by myself, the game shuts down. Since it shuts down whenever the menu is opened, I can't join online games, as the menu automatically opens when you first enter. It's only during Invasion.

This is what I copied from the log:

ScriptLog: ########## GaltanorsInvasion:StartNextWave() Starting Wave 3 ##########
Critical: appError called:
Critical: Assertion failed: ResolvedStyle [File:.\Src\UnUIComponents.cpp] [Line: 1353]
Unable to...

Crashes

item.title: Possible Browser Issue
item.author: invalid@example.com (Slaughter.SP)
item.dc:creator: Slaughter.SP
item.content:encoded: The two new Davision and Fraegers mutators seem to be causing odd server browser issues. When I have them on the commandline, my server in Favorites shows 9999 in the ping and I cannot join via the browser (I can still use 'open'). When I remove them the ping shows normal and I can then join.

item.title: Crash online with v22
item.author: invalid@example.com (Davision3D)
item.dc:creator: Davision3D
item.content:encoded:
It seems i cant play the new version online! Im always crashing with this little error window which name i cant remember right now. Anyway it always happens randomly after a few minutes. I allready tried it on different servers and also tried it with reinstalling the mod.

Here is one of the logs, in the log before i had only the same ninja bunny file errors which are very strange because im sure the files are in that package.

Code:
og: Begin Async loading packages for Family 'IRNF':...
Crash online with v22

item.title: Confirm bug reports
item.author: invalid@example.com (Galtanor)
item.dc:creator: Galtanor
item.content:encoded:
I have several 'bugs' that have been reported, some of them from several versions ago. Also we have recently had UT3 Patch 3 released. Can anyone confirm if they are still having any of these issues?

* In online games, players will connect, and get to the map view prior to the "Pre-cache" message, and then it disconnects them
* BiaVote hangs when the players lose the game instead of going directly to the map vote
* Game spawns a bot even with "numplay=0" in BiaVote
* Sometimes when all...

Confirm bug reports
